mapper.select: select id, uid, order_id, auth_no, phone, id_card, real_name, trans_amt, pay_trans_amt, auth_status, pay_status, tenant_id, type, deposit_type, create_time, update_time from t_free_deposit_order where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_free_deposit_order(uid, order_id, auth_no, phone, id_card, real_name, trans_amt, pay_trans_amt, auth_status, pay_status, tenant_id, type, deposit_type, create_time, update_time) values (#{uid}, #{orderId}, #{authNo}, #{phone}, #{idCard}, #{realName}, #{transAmt}, #{payTransAmt}, #{authStatus}, #{payStatus}, #{tenantId}, #{type}, #{depositType}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update t_free_deposit_order
uid = #{uid},
order_id = #{orderId},
auth_no = #{authNo},
phone = #{phone},
id_card = #{idCard},
real_name = #{realName},
trans_amt = #{transAmt},
pay_trans_amt = #{payTransAmt},
auth_status = #{authStatus},
pay_status = #{payStatus},
tenant_id = #{tenantId},
type = #{type},
deposit_type = #{depositType},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
